name: Sadness & Grace
description:
Sadness & Grace is a GM-less TTRPG for four players, each playing the Monarch of a kingdom at war. Players are invited to explore how the personal ties, emotional whims and flighty natures of each Monarch (defined by their Sources of Sadness and Reasons for Grace) shape the unfolding conflict, playing their own battles in amongst the wider landscape of war. The action rotates between each Monarch's castle, giving the players the chance not just to play the Monarch of their own kingdom, but Advisers and Petitioners from others too, constantly shaping the story and complicating each Monarch's position... 

Available as pdf or plain text word document; preview copies are available for free, which contain the first 2 of 6 pages. Free copies can be made available on request, but if you can afford $3 please help to support these games!

Created for the "Collab with a Bot!" jam and inspired by the tweet: 

You have two stats: sadness and grace. Use sadness to kill and grace to sense joy.
